description:
In this flashback episode, it`s time for the Keroro Platoon to meet for the first time, but Keroro`s gotten himself, Giroro, and Zeroro locked in their old clubhouse!  Afterwards, it`s time for the Keroro Platoon`s first mission, with Keroro having forgotten the Kero Ball.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kero Zero, Keroro Platoon`s Departure Last Night / Kero Zero, Keroro Platoon`s First Mission
ケロゼロ ケロロ小隊出発前夜 であります / ケロゼロ ケロロ小隊ファーストミッション であります
